logline: A cracked digital display pulses with real-time metrics of competence, revealing the blurred lines between human expertise and AI-generated outputs.
scene: Inside a stark, dimly lit control room, rows of flickering monitors illuminate a table strewn with discarded diplomas and certification papers, symbols of a crumbling credentialing system. In the center, a holographic interface displays a continuous stream of performance evaluations for AI-assisted professionals, the metrics pulsating and shifting in real-time. Outside the glass wall, a crowd of anxious job seekers peer in, their faces reflecting confusion and frustration as they await evaluation in a world where traditional credentials have become meaningless. A subtle hum of machinery fills the air, hinting at the relentless processing of applications and outputs that now define competence.
keyProps: discarded diplomas and certifications on the table
a holographic interface with real-time performance data
a waiting area filled with anxious job seekers
industrial machinery subtly humming in the background
camera: Wide-angle shot capturing the control room's sweeping view, transitioning to close-ups of the holographic interface and the crowd outside.
lighting: Cold, fluorescent lighting that casts harsh shadows, emphasizing the starkness of the environment and the anxiety of the individuals present.
productionDesign: A mix of stark industrial materials like metal and glass, with a minimalist aesthetic that reflects a utilitarian approach to design. The control room is filled with a mix of obsolete technologies and cutting-edge holographic displays, symbolizing the transition from old systems to new chaos.
signatureTwist: The camera pans to reveal a subtle AI avatar, not humanoid, but instead represented as a series of shifting symbols and data streams, highlighting its omnipresence in evaluating human capability without ever being licensed itself.
